mapper.insert: insert into iov_fence_line (line_id, fence_id, line_name, road_label_id, clean_level, start_point_name, end_point_name, community_code, line_options, purling_count, sweep_count, dedust_count, purling_direction, sweep_direction, dedust_direction, line_length, line_width, line_area, location_info, create_time, modify_time, delete_status) values (#{lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fenceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cleanLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startPointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endPointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{communityCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lineOptions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purlingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sweepCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dedustCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purlingDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sweepDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dedustDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lineLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lineWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lineArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{locationInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update iov_fence_line set fence_id = #{fenceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, line_name = #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, road_label_id = #{roadLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, clean_level = #{cleanLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_point_name = #{startPointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_point_name = #{endPointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_code = #{communityCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, line_options = #{lineOptions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purling_count = #{purlingCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sweep_count = #{sweepCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dedust_count = #{dedustCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purling_direction = #{purlingDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sweep_direction = #{sweepDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dedust_direction = #{dedustDirection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, line_length = #{lineLength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, line_width = #{lineWidth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, line_area = #{lineArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, location_info = #{locationInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT} where line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select line_id, fence_id, line_name, road_label_id, clean_level, start_point_name, end_point_name, community_code, line_options, purling_count, sweep_count, dedust_count, purling_direction, sweep_direction, dedust_direction, line_length, line_width, line_area, location_info, create_time, modify_time, delete_status from iov_fence_line where line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
